title: Integrative Therapy: Acupuncture | Banner Health
description: At Banner Health, we offer acupuncture as one of our integrative therapies to help our patients heal and control pain.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture is the most common procedure practiced within traditional Chinese medicine. Acupuncture is a means of adjusting the body's life energy by inserting fine needles into carefully selected acupuncture points. These needles are then manipulated to stimulate the flow of energy and remove blockages. Acupuncture increases blood flow to speed healing, and stimulates hormonal changes such as increasing the body's natural pain modulators (endorphins). The basic philosophy in Chinese medicine is where there is flow there is no pain, where there is pain there is no flow. Acupuncture assists in the free flow of energy and helps to keep the body in balance.
